name: Snack Time
description:
Snack Time is an arcade game where you are a snack delivery guy trying to beat your opponent by delivering more snacks to the stadium fans. Invest your initial funds wisely choosing the stock you are going to sell and try to get to your clients first! Don't make mistakes when selling snacks or you will be penalised for a few seconds!

Snack Time gameplay is easy to pick up!

* 9 levels
* 5 different enemies (different AIs)
* 2 different snacks
* 1 accessory to attack your opponents
* Free and supported by advertisements

Snack Time is developed by a solo developer - it would be really useful if you report any crashes or give any feedback on the game.
